SELECT 0 id, 0 type, '' imageUrl , '' title, '' content1, '' content2, '' content3, '' content4, '' content5 FROM osc_offer WHERE 1=2
union ALL (SELECT oo.id id, 1 type, oo.image_url imageUrl , oo.stu_name title, oo.school_desc content1, oo.major_name content2, '' content3, '' content4, '' content5 from osc_offer oo WHERE oo.del_flag=0
and ( oo.stu_name like concat('%', #{param.keyword},'%') or oo.school_desc like concat('%', #{param.keyword},'%') or oo.major_name like concat('%', #{param.keyword},'%') )
LIMIT 8
)
union ALL (SELECT one.id id, 2 type, one.iocn_url imageUrl, one.title title, one.web_url content1, '' content2, '' content3, '' content4, '' content5 from osc_news one WHERE one.del_flag=0
and ( one.title like concat('%', #{param.keyword},'%') )
LIMIT 8
)
union ALL
(SELECT ou.id id, 3 type, ou.logo_url imageUrl, ou.university_name title, oa.area_name content1, CONCAT(ou.country_name,'|',IFNULL(ou.province_name,''),'|',IFNULL(ou.city_name,'')) content2, ou.qs_rank content3, '' content4, '' content5 FROM osc_university ou LEFT JOIN osc_university_college ouc ON ou.id = ouc.university_id LEFT JOIN osc_college oc ON ouc.college_id = oc.id LEFT JOIN osc_area oa ON ou.area_id = oa.id WHERE ou.del_flag = 0
and ( ou.university_name like concat('%', #{param.keyword},'%') or oa.area_name like concat('%', #{param.keyword},'%') or ou.country_name like concat('%', #{param.keyword},'%') )
LIMIT 8
)
union ALL
(SELECT om.id id, 4 type, ou.logo_url imageUrl, om.major_name title, ou.university_name content1, oa.area_name content2, ou.qs_rank content3, oc.college_name content4, om.education_level content5 FROM osc_major om LEFT JOIN osc_university ou ON om.university_id = ou.id LEFT JOIN osc_college oc ON om.college_id = oc.id LEFT JOIN osc_area oa ON ou.area_id = oa.id
WHERE om.del_flag = 0
and ( om.major_name like concat('%', #{param.keyword},'%') or om.major_type like concat('%', #{param.keyword},'%') or ou.university_name like concat('%', #{param.keyword},'%') or oc.college_name like concat('%', #{param.keyword},'%') )
LIMIT 8
)
union ALL
(SELECT op.id id, 5 type, op.image_url imageUrl, op.product_name title, op.product_price content1, '' content2, '' content3, '' content3, '' content5 FROM osc_product op WHERE op.del_flag = 0
and ( op.product_name like concat('%', #{param.keyword},'%') )
LIMIT 8
)
